text: kaho, "kya main tumhen bataoon ki allaah ke yahaan parinaam kee spasht se isase bhee buree neeti kya hai? kaun giroh hai jisapar allaah kee phitakaar padee aur jisapar allaah ka prakop hua aur jisamen se usane bandar aur sooar banae aur jisane badhe hue fasaadee (taagoot) kee bandagee kee, ve log (tumase bhee) nikrsht darje ke the. aur ve (tumase bhee adhik) seedhe maarg se bhatake hue the.
